title: Comstock Plunges 19% Pre-Market After Announcing $30 Million Public Offering
snippet: Comstock Inc. shares dropped 19.21% in after-hours trading to $2.44 following a $30 million stock offering priced at $2.25 per share.

title: Comstock drops 12%, prices $30M offering at $2.25
snippet: Comstock ( NYSE: LODE) announced an underwritten public offering of ~13.33M shares at $2.25 per share. The gross proceeds are expected to be ~$30M. The company has granted the underwriter a 30-day option to purchase up to an additional 2M shares.

title: Comstock launches public offering of common stock; shares down
snippet: Comstock (LODE) announces a public offering of stock or pre-funded warrants to fund capital projects, corporate needs, and debt repayment.
